title: The Best 7 AI Floor Plan Generator Tools in 2025
summary: Discover the power of AI Floor Plan Generators, designed to streamline your architectural and interior design projects. These innovative tools enable you to create detailed, customizable floor plans in minutes, saving you time and enhancing creativity. Whether you're a professional designer or a DIY enthusiast, these AI solutions simplify the planning process, allowing for quick adjustments and visualizations. Explore our curated selection of AI Floor Plan Generators today and transform your design experience with cutting-edge technology. Start creating your ideal space now!

tools.name: Coohom
tools.description: Coohom is a cloud-based platform for creating 3D interior design visualizations and renderings.

tools.name: Maket
tools.description: Maket is a generative AI platform that automates architectural design, enabling architects and designers to create floorplans, 3D renders, and explore styles instantly.

tools.name: Spacely AI
tools.description: Spacely AI is an innovative AI-powered platform that enables users to generate professional interior design ideas, visualizations, and floor plans for homes and spaces effortlessly.

tools.name: HomeVisualizer.ai
tools.description: HomeVisualizer.ai is an AI-powered platform that enables users to generate and visualize home interior designs effortlessly.

tools.name: Kaedim
tools.description: Kaedim is an AI-powered platform that transforms 2D images into production-ready 3D models to accelerate content creation for game developers and creators.

tools.name: Luw.ai
tools.description: Luw.ai is an AI-powered platform that revolutionizes home design by providing tools for instant interior and exterior visualizations and transformations.

tools.name: Planner 5D
tools.description: Planner 5D is an AI-powered home design platform for creating 2D/3D floor plans and interior designs.
